name: Trash Trader
description:
It's the kart derby day and you've completely forgotten to assemble you kart yet! You'll need to rummage through the junkyard and find items to build your Kart with, BUT WAIT! All the good items are gone, you'll have to find out what people are trading and locate the opposite items to trade with them.

Originally made for Global Game Jam, and then polished up. A short game about finding items & trading with others to create a trash built go-kart.
